entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
